attributes.action: Ban animal testing (not just in cosmetics)
attributes.additional_details: It’s 2019, it’s time for change, it’s time to stop animals suffering unnecessarily!
attributes.background: Whilst there has been a lot noise made regarding animal testing in cosmetics, the truth is the testing doesn’t stop there. We need to make all products in every department cruelty free. So many amazing companies have made  amazing cruelty free products, so it is possible!
